page.title: 14ABERDEEN:THE UNIVERSITY.
page.content:
UNIVERSITY OF ABERDEEN
Opposite our school (Linksfield Academy), in the area of Old Aberdeen, is the university.
There are 5,700 students at the university, studying many subjects including the conventional ones like English and Maths to the more unusual ones like Church History and Defence Studies.
The students live in Halls of Residence or in 'digs' - as a paying guest in someone's house. The students eat at the Central Refectory.
There are excellent sports facilities at the Indoor and Outdoor Sports Complexes.
